name: Shaplor
description:
Play with the colored shape and try to touch falling colored shapes similar to yours to get a lot of scores

the way of playing:

Move your colored shape by sliding your finger left and right to touch the colored shapes, If you are wondering what colored shapes to touch and not to touch, In short:

  • Match in shape or color =  1 score.
  • Match in shape and color = 5 score.
  • Not match in shape or color = lose.
Note:

This game is in early access, so some assets are missing, and glitches can be there as well.
